metadata.title: CVE-2016-8569 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The git_oid_nfmt function in commit.c in libgit2 before 0.24.3 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference)via a cat-file command with a crafted object file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8569` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgit2-24 - 0.24.1-2ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.24.1-2ubuntu0.2+esm1').
